verses.content: Manasse chu ro a rêl ṭan chun kum sâwmpahnia upa a na, Jerusalema chun kum sâwmnga panga sûng ro a rêl a.
Ama chun LALPAIN Israel mi- hai hmaa a hnawt suokhai, khawhri be mihai tirdakumna ang chun LALPA mithmuah thil ṭha naw chu a thawh a.

A pa Hezekiain a lo suksiet ta hnung bâwlhmunhai kha a siem ṭha nâwk a; Baal ta dingin mâichâmhai a dâw thar nâwk bawk a; Asera a siem a, vâna thil umhai po po chu chibai a bûk a, an rawng a bâwl bawk a.
Chun, LALPA ina chun mâi- châmhai a siem a, LALPA chun a kuoma, “Jerusalema hin ka hming chu kumkhuoin um zing a tih,” a tinaa chun.
LALPA in tuolpûk pahnia chun vâna thil umhai po po ta ding chun mâichâmhai a siem a.

Hinnom naupa ruoma chun a nauhai chu mei ân fêthlengtir bawk a; aisân a hmang a, zâwldiaihai a hmang a, dâwi a hmang bawk a, thlarau zâwlhai a sawr bawk a, thiemrauhai leh; LALPA mithmua chun thil suol nasatak el ama chu suklungsen dingin a thaw tah a.

Chun, milim kerṭielhai, ama siem chu LALPA ina chun a sie a; chu chungthua chun Pathien chun David le a naupa Solomon kuoma chun, “Hi ina le Jerusalema khawm, Israel hnam po po laia inthawka ka thlang suoka hin, kumkhuoa dingin ka hming chu sieng ka ta,

in thlatuhai ta dinga ram ka iruot taha inthawk chun Israel kepha chu sawn ta bawk naw ning a; Mosie hmanga thupêkhai, thuruothai, dân- hai po po, anni thu ka pêkhai po po chu an thaw phawt chun,” a lo tina LALPA ina chun a sie a nih.
Manasse chun Juda le Jerusa- lema umhai chu ân suksuoltir a; chuongchun, Israelhai hmaa LALPA- IN a sukbohmang hnamhai nêk hman khan thil suol an thaw nasa lem a.
Chuongchun, Manasse le a mi- hai kuoma chun LALPA chun thu a hril a, nisienlakhawm, an pawisa nawh a.
Chuleiin, LALPAIN Assuria lal sipai hotuhai chu a hung ṭhuoi a, Manasse chu khaidietin an khit a, thîr kawl an inbuntir a, Babulonah an fepui tah a.
Chuongchun, rimsitaka a hung um huna chun LALPA a Pathien chu a zawng a, a thlatuhai Pathien hmaa chun ama le ama chu nasatakin ân sukhnuoi tah a.

Chun, ama kuoma chun a ṭawngṭai a, ama chu dawnsakin a um a, a hnina chu ngaiin a um a, ama ramah, Jerusalema chun hung ṭhuoi nâwkin a um tah a. Chun, Manasse chun LALPA chu Pathien a nih ti a hriet tah a.

Chun, hi hnunga hin Nga dai Kawtkhâr lûtna, phairuom a, Gihon sîr thlang a, David khawpui dang a puo lema chun kul a bâwl a; Ophel tieng a sukkuol a, insângtakin a suk- sâng a; chun, Juda rama khawpui kul neiahai chun hotu thilthawthei- takhai a sie tâwl a.

Chun, Pathien danglamhai le, milimhai chu LALPA ina inthawk chun a lâk suok a, LALPA in tlânga mâichâm a lo siem tahai po po le, Jerusalema mihai le khan a lâk hmang vawng a; khawpui puoa chun a peihâwn tah a.
LALPA mâichâm chu a buotsai a, chutaka chun inremna thilinhlân- hai, lâwmthu hrilna inthâwinahai ân hlân a, Israel Pathien LALPA rawng chu bâwl dingin Juda mihai chu thu a pêk tah a.
Nisienlakhawm, mipuihai chu bâwlhmunhaiah an lân thâwi ta rawp a chu, LALPA an Pathien kuoma chun a nih an inthâwi.
Manasse thilthaw danghai le a Pathien kuoma a ṭawngṭaina dâm le Israel Pathien, LALPA hminga a kuoma zâwlneiin a hril thuhai dâm chu ngai ta, Israel lalhai thilthawhai lai chun ziek a nih.

A ṭawngṭaina dâm, ama Pathienin a lo ngaisak dânhai dâm, a suolna po po le a bawsietna po po le, bâwlhmun a siemna hmunhai le, ama le ama ân sukhnuoi hmaa Asera a siem dâm le, milim ker a siemhai thu chu, ngai ta, Hozai chanchinbua chun ziek an nih.
Chuongchun, Manasse chu a thlatuhai lai a in tah a, ama ina ngei chun an phûm tah a, a naupa Amon chun ama aia chun ro a rêl tah a.
Amon chu ro a rêl ṭan chun kum sâwmhni pahnia upa a na; Jerusa- lema chun kum hni sûng ro a rêl a.
A pa Manasse ang bawk khan, LALPA mithmuah thil suol chu a thawh a; Amon chu a pa Manassein milim ker a lo siem tahai po po kuoma khan ân thawi a, an rawng a bâwl a.
A pa Manasse ân sukhnuoi ta ang khan ama hi chu LALPA hmaa chun ân sukhnuoi ve nawh a; chuong- chun, hi Amon hi chu a suol nasa deu deu tah a.
Chun, a siehlawhai chun ama chu an phierrûk a, ama in sûnga ngei chun an that tah a.
Amiruokchu, chu rama mihai chun lal Amon phierrutuhai po po an that a; chun, chu rama mipuihai chun a naupa Josia chu ama aia chun lalah an siem tah a.
